item.title: Wicked's Impressive VOD Revenue Total Revealed In Rare Studio Move
item.description: After a strong run at the box office last year, Wickedâ€™s total VOD revenue is made public at CinemaCon in what marks a rare movie info reveal.

item.title: Disney's Snow White Gets IMDb Disclaimer After A Wave Of 1-Star Reviews Makes Overall Rating Plummet
item.description: Disney's Snow White has not gotten a disclaimer on IMDb after a horde of 1-star reviews cues the site to warn users of "unusual voting activity."

item.title: Dwayne Johnson's $2 Billion Franchise Really Needs To Return, But A New Update Makes Me Doubt It'll Happen
item.description: Now is a brilliant time for a Jumanji sequel with Dwayne Johnson, but Jack Black's recent update makes me doubt if Jumanji 4 will even happen in 2026.
